gobblin.converter

Class AvroToAvroConverterBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.converter.Converter<Schema,Schema,GenericRecord,GenericRecord>
      • gobblin.converter.AvroToAvroConverterBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FinalState, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AvroFilterConverter, AvroProjectionConverter

    public abstract class AvroToAvroConverterBase
extends Converter<Schema,Schema,GenericRecord,GenericRecord>
    A base abstract Converter class for data transformation from Avro to Avro.
